name: Stardust Valkyries
description:
Nine shining characters designed around physics sandbox toys and unique movement
Anime fighter influence brings increased focus on setplay, blockstrings, and chain combos
Full soundtrack and nine cosmic horror background stages
Built in rollback netcode and 90 input display combo trials
Immediate plans to support SDVS with free post-launch characters

https://discord.gg/5Ru9RFRQYv

Epilepsy warning: This game contains many flashing images and animations
